name: Space Factory
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Follow along the track to get scraps. Use these scraps to buy upgrades. Every five rounds choose an ability/skill and see how far you can go!

DISCRIPTION

Thanks to Jman on Spotify for creating music for this game. Go check him out here:

Spotify – Jman

Jman - Topic - YouTube

Made for the second Scratch community game jam.

There is an end to the game.
